extendedInfo.description: Please send all feedback/issues to the support email! This is a work-in-progress and I need your input to make it better!It's like regular hardware only it's...sonic. This fully-manipulatable 3D sonic device - made famous by the enigmatic doctor who invented it - includes 9 functionality modules and customizations. Many functions give REAL sensor readings, others will appeal to devout sci-fi fans. Support phones and tablets in magnificent HD.The "Ninth" device in "Basic" mode with the "Blue Steel" energy signature is free.BASIC (free)This mode lets you move and rotate the tool around in 3D space. Activate it with the sonic device's button and change energy styles in the menu. Double tap-drag to rotate and pinch to zoom and rotate. Most other features also allow for 3D manipulation and activation."ALLONSY!"This ship looks smaller on the outside. Tilt phone/tablet to move, hold your finger on the screen to zoom forward. It's hard to control, but travelling through space and time often is. Hold your phone parallel to the ground to keep it still.SHARK BAITDangle your sonic device as shark bait. Tilt phone/tablet to see the device respond to real-world gravity. Activate its sonic button to summon the shark!TIMEPIECEA clock by any other name. How will you know when you are without a proper timepiece?OPEN RIFTActivate your sonic device to open and close a webcam rift.SHATTERThe universe is like a piece of glass. If you break it in one spot, the whole thing starts to shatter. Use your sonic device to illustrate the metaphor in dramatic fashion.COMPASS"Lots of planets have a north," including this one. Let your sonic hardware be your guide to find it. Also displays your current heading in degrees.PARA-EMFUse these readings to detect variations in the magnetic waves around your phone - often signs of ghosts or other paranormal and inter-dimensional energy. Expressed in microteslas (uT).CLIMATEFind out your local weather while travelling so you know if you'll need an umbrella.11 ENERGY SIGNATURESSwitch out the look of your device while activated.3 MODELS; MORE COMING SOON!Seventh, Ninth, and Eleventh are available at the moment.LEGALNote that this software is IN NO WAY OFFICIALLY AFFILIATED with any other brand than that of its creator or with any existing TARDIS, Dalek, Dr. Who, or Sonic Screwdriver apps.

reviews.title: Erm
reviews.comment: Show us what it can do and maybe we\'ll pay for full. Nothin doin on demo. V boring
reviews.author: Peter Bullen

reviews.title: A Few More Freedoms Would Make It More Appealing
reviews.comment: I love the way the app works. It\'s all very smooth and the graphics are just beautiful! But perhaps if a few of the other features were free... Such as the weather or timepiece. That way, other users might be more willing to pay for the other features... I know I would!
reviews.author: Muffin Dash

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This is so cool! The only problem is that I clicked to unlock all current and future, but it charged and gave me only all features...
reviews.author: Hayden Adoff

reviews.title: Great sonic app
reviews.comment: Its a great sonic screwdriver app thats better than the inaccurate free one, only main issue you should\'ve added more options for free rather than one screwdriver and function. Open more options for free and lessen the price, you\'ll get better reviews.
reviews.author: tony lewis

reviews.title: I like it but....
reviews.comment: Its a very good app for that Doctor Who fan that needs their Sonic Screwdriver, but for me.....it seems that when ever I try to go into the shark, the button lights up and stays lighted up and crashes, and then the weather one seems to work, but only when it wants to and by that when it doesnt it force closes the app.....so, if you can, can you fix those two problems?......thank you and again its a great app, its just those two problems.....have a nice night/day!   Edit: i have a Galaxy S4....but i mostly keep it on the charger while i\'m messing with my phone....
reviews.author: Robert Gullickson

reviews.title: It seems nice but it\'s not free
reviews.comment: Although I know you have to make profit from the app, I\'m disappointed, I can\'t buy it even if I want to. Anyway, you get 4 stars \'cause it\'s really good. I have a suggestion - maybe it\'d be better if when you release the button on the screwdriver, the light would gradually turn off the same way it turns on rather than instantly stopping.
reviews.author: NoxD NamexD

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Cool app but I wish the free version has at least a couple things to play around with but I got only one but the 3D effects are pretty awesome and makes this app above average
reviews.author: zachary deemer

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Release the other features for free and I will give this app 5 stars
reviews.author: Harry Leyland Sissons

reviews.title: GOOD BUT
reviews.comment: Needs more screwdrivers free only have one setting
reviews.author: Matthew Sales

reviews.title: Paywall
reviews.comment: Too much payed content.  Not enough free experience to see if app is worth it
reviews.author: Diego Camarotta

reviews.title: Sweet!
reviews.comment: It has a great effect and sound! But it\'s a bit loud. If you could fix it, OH MY GALLIFREY, thank you!
reviews.author: Walid Ghaziri

reviews.title: Full version rocks
reviews.comment: Just got the full version and it\'s great.  My other sonic screwdriver app would freeze on me so I got this and gave the other one the boot and I kust say it is definitely worth the money
reviews.author: David Johnson

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Everything is nice but the rift option crashes everytime.
reviews.author: Tanner Day

reviews.title: A flashy light
reviews.comment: Does nothing other than light up, no sound, anything else you have to pay . Uninstalled after 2 minutes
reviews.author: Alex Wood

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: Money grab on copyrighted material. Make it completely free with the option to donate.
reviews.author: Orion Roberts

reviews.comment: Amazing
reviews.author: Sandra Mendonca

reviews.title: Hi
reviews.comment: Hi how does the ghost finder work?
reviews.author: Siobhan Green

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Cool
reviews.author: Jovan Jecinac

reviews.title: Very Cool
reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: Sam Brown

reviews.title: Sounds fantastic, however...
reviews.comment: It consumes a large quantity of space. If it fills up that much space, then certainly there should not be as much for me to purchase. It sounds like an interesting application. I should like to use it and rate it with five stars. Unfortunately, I haven\'t seen the greater of it. So I don\'t know if I should give it five stars. The description is what caught my attention. That is until I discovered that in order to use this application in it\'s entirety, I must first make a purchase.
reviews.author: Bradley Graham
